name: TritonUpdates
0:
”Alexa, what's my Flash Briefing?”
”Alexa, play my Flash Briefing”
skdetail:
Flash Briefing Skill
This skill contains: dynamic content.
des:
This skill is built for Rady Flex Weekend 2019 Cohort Students, who are working full time and carves out time to go to weekend classes. Trying to manage work, family and school can be challenging sometimes and you wish there was a virtual assistant who can spit out the upcoming deadlines important to your current quarter! Who wants to login to Triton Ed and flip through the deadlines? Every week the deadlines are updated to keep you posted of the upcoming deadlines.

Worry not, Tritonn Updates is here to help you!
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
